quote: Questions provide the key to unlocking our unlimited potential.
And what is the potential man, after all? Is he not the sum of all that is human? Divine, in other words?
By the year 2000 we will, I hope, raise our children to believe in human potential, not God.
Every man is a potential genius until he does something.
Everyone needs to be valued. Everyone has the potential to give something back.
Humanity has only scratched the surface of its real potential.
I don't even read most reviews, unless there is a potential lawsuit on view.
I will fight for my children on any level so they can reach their potential as human beings and in their public duties.

By the year 2000 we will, I hope, raise our children to believe in human potential, not God.
Every man is a potential genius until he does something.
Everyone needs to be valued. Everyone has the potential to give something back.
Humanity has only scratched the surface of its real potential.
I don't even read most reviews, unless there is a potential lawsuit on view.
I will fight for my children on any level so they can reach their potential as human beings and in their public duties.
In every difficult situation is potential value. Believe this, then begin looking for it.
Joy comes from using your potential.
Knowledge is only potential power.
Man is as full of potential as he is of importance.
No matter what the level of your ability, you have more potential than you can ever develop in a lifetime.
Our technological powers increase, but the side effects and potential hazards also escalate.
Silence is as full of potential wisdom and wit as the unshown marble of great sculpture.
Teaching is an instinctual art, mindful of potential, craving of realizations, a pausing, seamless process.
The greatest quest in life is to reach one's potential.
The real community of man is the community of those who seek the truth, of the potential knowers.
You are the only person in existence who can use your potential. It is an awesome responsibility.
Your past is not your potential. In any hour you can choose to liberate the future.
